REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0203 reute d f BC-SYSTEMED-<SYMD>-INSTA 03-04 0045

TEXT.TITLE: SYSTEMED <SYMD> INSTALLS PHARMACY SYSTEM
TEXT.BODY: SysteMed Inc said it has sold a Pharmacy Module to 998-bed Memorial Medical Center of Long Beach, Calif. Pharmacy Module is a computerized drug information system. Value was not disclosed. Reuter
